verbs.description: [V: According] to the Department of Homeland Security , at least 2,000 kids have been taken away from their families as a result of the Trump administration 's policy to crackdown on illegal immigration .

According to the Department of Homeland Security , at least 2,000 kids [V: have] been taken away from their families as a result of the Trump administration 's policy to crackdown on illegal immigration .

According to the Department of Homeland Security , at least 2,000 kids have [V: been] taken away from their families as a result of the Trump administration 's policy to crackdown on illegal immigration .

[ARGM-ADV: According to the Department of Homeland Security] , [ARG1: at least 2,000 kids] have been [V: taken] [ARGM-DIR: away] [ARG2: from their families] [ARGM-CAU: as a result of the Trump administration 's policy to crackdown on illegal immigration] .

According to the Department of Homeland Security , at least 2,000 kids have been taken away from their families as a result of the Trump administration 's policy to [V: crackdown] [ARG1: on illegal immigration] .
